經過今季
我對佢兩個踢後備都冇乜信心

Jorginho


"He has brilliant feet, can play in various positions on the pitch and is very smart,"

(Former great Italian player and manager Giovanni Trappatoni)


“He is smart, he knows his football and if I had to make a comparison to another of his ilk I would say Andrea Pirlo”

(Ex-Verona director Giovanni Galli, 2014, on the player's development)




“He is the kind of player who can help us change attitude during a match and that is important.”

(Former Napoli manager Rafael Benitez)



“He always plays in tight situations and passes very close to him. It’s very hard to follow him and stop his plays. You get tired cause he moves the ball very fast, but he didn’t even move himself”

(Radja Nainggolan)



“I really like Jorginho, he’s not a well-known player but he’s perfect for Napoli. He’s always involved in the play, giving alternatives to his teammates and great dynamism.”

(Xabi Alonso)


“Jorginho is marvellous”

(Pep Guardiola)
